title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 97.6 - Administrative hearing officers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 97.6 - Administrative hearing officers

State Regulations

All hearings shall be conducted by administrative law judges (hearing officers)
appointed by the Attorney General or the Attorney General's designee. The hearing officer shall be an attorney who has not worked on or otherwise
become familiar with the facts of the matter in issue, and shall exercise his or her judgment independently and impartially. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
97.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
